mapper.select: select count(*) as login_date from run_bike.login_log where u_idx = #{u_idx} and login_date = #{date};
mapper.insert: insert into user (u_id, u_pw, u_name, u_photo, regdate, u_code) values(#{u_id},#{u_pw},#{u_name},#{u_photo}, #{regdate},#{u_code})
mapper.update: update user set u_verify=true where u_id=#{param1} and u_code = #{param2}
update user set u_pw=#{u_pw}, u_name=#{u_name}, u_photo=#{u_photo} where u_idx=#{u_idx}
mapper.select: select u_idx from user where u_id=#{u_id}
select pc_masterYn from run_bike.user, run_bike.participation where user.u_idx = participation.u_idx and user.u_idx = #{u_idx};
select u_leave from run_bike.user where u_id=#{u_id}

select count(r_idx) as total_count, sum(r_riding_time) as total_time,round(sum(r_riding_km),2) as total_KM,round(avg(r_riding_km),2) as avg_KM, round(avg(r_riding_time),2) as avg_time from run_bike.user u inner join run_bike.record r where u.u_idx = r.u_idx and u.u_idx = #{u_idx}

select r_idx, r_finish, date_format(r_riding_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as r_riding_date, r_riding_km, r_riding_time from run_bike.record inner join run_bike.user on user.u_idx = #{u_idx} order by r_riding_date desc limit 0,5
